rooms.description: A combined living room and open-plan kitchen area that merges Mediterranean aesthetics with functionality. Features include a central island, natural stone finishes, and ample light from large windows to maximize space and energy flow as per Vastu principles.

A dedicated space for multimedia entertainment with soundproofing features, ambient lighting, and comfortable seating. The layout is designed to enhance acoustics while providing privacy and maintaining energy flow in accordance with Vastu.

openings.description: The main entrance is placed on the southern side of the apartment to invite positive energy as per Vastu. It includes a covered vestibule area.
Provides access to the outdoor terrace that overlooks the irregular plot, incorporating Mediterranean style detailing with wrought iron balustrades and greenery for aesthetic appeal.
